key.label: Access Key ID
key.help: Specify your AWS Access Key ID

secret.label: Secret Access Key
secret.help: Specify your AWS Secret Access Key

region.label: Region
region.help: (Optional) Specify your AWS S3 Region. Default us-standard

path.label: Path
path.help: (Optional) Specify your AWS Bucket root folder. Default root (/).

fileNameKey.label: File Name Key
fileNameKey.help: (Optional) If blank, file names will be auto-generated otherwise, the value of this field is grabbed from the data and set as name of the file.

fileContentKey.label: File Content Key
fileContentKey.help: (Optional) If blank, the content of the file is the data itself (JSON Document) otherwise, the value of this field is grabbed from the data and set as contents of the file.
